name: CYBER STORM
description:
In cyber Storm You must defend or attack an electronic system Computer, game console, server All this in a Sci-fi environment You can play two classes Viruses, antivirus. You have eight characters to play with.

four Classes Are At Your Disposal

to Have Access to
-an Assault Rifle
-a Machine Gun
-a Shotgun
-and A Sniper

Each character has their own ability which allows you to have a different vision of the game
Team spirit is very important and will allow you to recover the machine infected by viruses

TWO MAIN GAMEMODE

possession

his is the main mode of my game the objective is to take control of the main unit The electronic system To get there You will have to use the abilities of each character And have good team cohesion Plan good attacks or many good defenses

team Deathmatch

This game mode is quite classic but it allows you to fight four against four And
the goal is to make the most Eliminations in a certain time
